title: Computer: tool for the future
creator_credit: Yves Gerard Issembert, Sidney Platt and National Geographic Society
brief_description: A look at the history of tools such as the abacus, adding machines and computers, the recent developments in computer technology and how computers are used to manage information and various applications of computers today. Also mentions some of the concerns that computerization raises.
